migration.title: WeChat Account Data Migration
migration.description: Due to WeChat Open Platform entity changes, please login with WeChat again to update account identification and recover your historical data

notice.1: Please use the same WeChat account to complete two login authorizations
notice.2: Do not close the browser or refresh the page during migration
notice.3: After migration, the system will automatically update your account identification

step.1: First login: Use your WeChat account to login, system will record your historical account information
step.2: Second login: Use the same WeChat account to login again, system will record your latest account information
step.3: Confirm migration: System will establish the connection between old and new account information to recover your historical data

migration.bind_old_description: Please login with your WeChat account, system will record your historical account information
migration.bind_new_description: Please login again with the same WeChat account, system will record your latest account information
migration.wechat_auth_failed: WeChat authorization failed, please try again
migration.accounts_required: Please complete both WeChat logins to record account information first
migration.failed: Account connection failed, please try again
migration.processing_description: Processing WeChat authorization information, please wait...
migration.scan_qr_description: Open WeChat and scan the QR code above to complete authorization
migration.qr_expired: QR code has expired, please regenerate

form.description_label: Please describe the issue in detail?
form.description_required: Please describe the issue in detail
form.description_help: Please provide detailed usage scenarios and necessary screenshots to help us understand your needs and provide support~
form.upload_help: Support jpg, png, gif, pdf, doc, docx formats, max 5MB per file
form.success_message: Feedback submitted successfully! Thank you for your feedback.
